name: A Night Duty
storyline:
Your duty as a South Korean army officer just began.
You must check out mysterious anomalies to finish this endless night.

An indie game inspired by [The Backrooms] and [The Exit 8].
summary: It is an upcoming horror game developed in South Korea. The player can simulate a night duty as an officer in Korean army base. It is a game that inspired by the game The Exit 8.

videos.title: 당직근무 A Night Duty 출시예고 트레일러
